EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q416.Reminder - Hartford 11-15-16
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud-Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Hartford. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow—Hartford, CT Wednesday, November 16, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast 9:30am – 10:30am The Cloud-Native Advantage 10:30am – 12:00pm The Promises of a Cloud-Native Platform 12:00pm – 1:00pm Lunch 1:00pm – 1:30pm The Value Moves Up the Stack 1:30pm – 3:15pm Architecting the Cloud-Native Application 3:15pm – 3:30pm Wrap Up Roadshow Agenda <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/hartford]]>
Location: University of Hartford - Gray Conference Center 200 Bloomfield Avenue, West Hartford, CT 06117 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/University+of+Hartford/@41.7948473,-72.7180217,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x89e7ab35ea5875bf:0x7ef2ce9901ecdb17!8m2!3d41.7948473!4d-72.7158277]]>
Parking <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/625-IUJ-009/images/Cloud Native Roadshow 111616 %281%29.pdf]]> For any guests that may require parking, please print out the attached parking permit and place it on your dashboard the day of the event. Our parking assignment is in F Lot. A map has been attached for your convenience.
Questions? Contact Jason Lee at jalee@pivotal.io or call 415-300-7595 <[[tel:1-415-300-7595]]>.
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
The Pivotal Team
